评论概述: Very cute, can wear both together
评论详情: These are overall, very adorable. They anre actually a really decent size, not small or too big, but still comfortable and lightweight on. The quality is good, t’s even and straight and there were only one stray thread I had to trim. The hair band is very bendy so it can fit anyone. Once on, it felt secure and stood in place for 4+ hours, and with that, I would still recommend.

评论详情: These bands are lightweight & fit all different head types. It's stretchy but comfortable. It's great for a rocker style outfit. The price is nice for a double set.
